author: mikem
msg: DERBY-2254 Assert during log file switch: log file position exceeded max log file size
backport change #1102417 from trunk to 10.5 branch.
Increase overhead requirements which trigger log file switches when the
checkpointing thread can't keep up with log writers.

msg: Simplify assertions, and provide details if the strings are not equal
